replies.body: Buggy Patch the team bonuses are not registering all the champs on the board, I have to replace every champ each round to activate the buffs. It did it for my Gunslinger and Blademasters

More having this BUG in all trait, (for yordle as well in my case).
FIX it lol.

Gunslinger bonus is 1/3/5 ingame not 1/2/4 (Possible typo?) also, building a class item (i.e. botrk - blademaster) causes a bug for your team bonus to not be recognised until all characters have been taken off board and replaced?
Also noticed the item slots on your little legends pedestal is missing a slot (top-right/top-middle).
there is a bug that you need check ASAP, the knight buff will disappear automatically when each play finished or new play starts which can only be solved by replace all champions!!!
it is more like that data of knight champions just disappear from games
and another bug, or it can be same type of bug that my shapeshifter has same problem when I get into new plays.

Echoing others: TFT right now is unplayable due to the bug where synergies won't register as they should be. I've reported the bug but every game I've played has been basically unplayable due to this bug ruining a core part of the game. (You're basically playing a zero synergy game and HOPING that the opponent has the same bug because if you have no synergies due to the bug and they have synergies because they don't have the bug...you lose.)
